data.text: @InfoPEI I am not happy about them doing away with the vax pass
@Ms_Debby_Jane @InfoPEI Your brainwashed.  If you call this freedom you must like being dictated too.

@InfoPEI CDC saying areas with low amounts of Covid-19 cases can drop indoor masking.
When will this science make it to PEI?

@InfoPEI Why is the State of Public Health Emergency not dropped?
There is no « health emergency » and the vaccination passport ended today.
No reason it should still be active.
Please explain
@Ms_Debby_Jane @jgmarchbank @InfoPEI Your health is not others responsibility

@InfoPEI End all the restrictions on our lives. It's all bullshit anyway you know it and we know it too now. Let us live our lives we only have 1. Pull your heads out of Trudeaus and Klaus Schwabs ass and stand up for islanders that you say you give a shit about

@Ms_Debby_Jane @jgmarchbank @InfoPEI I’m not getting anymore boosters, had enough nasty side effects with the third dose. When the mask mandates are lifted, you guys that still want to wear them should upgrade to N95, something that actually protects the person wearing it from inhaling airborne particles.
